name: Magicians Have Long Handkerchiefs
description:
A puzzle game by duyaa and Toombler for the second Thinky Puzzle Game Jam. There are 21 levels.

Made in Pattern:Script, ClementSparrow's fork of PuzzleScript.

Controls: 

  • Z is undo
  • R is restart
  • WASD or arrow keys for movement 
  • ESC exits to the menu
  • M is mute

External link: https://clementsparrow.github.io/Pattern-Script/src/play.html?p=11c5569846f4801f...

Hack link: https://clementsparrow.github.io/Pattern-Script/src/editor.html?hack=11c5569...

Note: there is no level select, but if you get stuck, you can play in the editor "hack" link above, which lets you skip between levels by ctrl-clicking on their text at the bottom of the page.

Playtested by: ft029 and 5381
